story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0101_0100_1: I’m an Ace Trainer... I can’t lose...
story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0101_0200_1:
H-hey! I’m an Ace Trainer. One step away from
the main tournament matches of the PML!
story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0101_0300_1:
There’s no way I’ll lose against a few random
sync pairs!
story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0501_0100_1:
H-how? I... Is this how strong the other teams
heading to the tournament are?
story_zako_battle_10_01/3801_0501_0200_1:
Nah! I’m probably just having a bad day!
I would have been able to beat you normally!
story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0101_0100_1:
How many more badges do you need?
Oh, just one? 
You’re pretty good at this, aren’t you?
story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0101_0200_1:
If I ever want something, somebody either gives
it to me or I take it from them.
story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0101_0300_1:
I want everything you have, so I’m going to
take it from you!
story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0501_0100_1:
I wonder... If I’d worked harder, could I be
competing in the PML right now, too?
Maybe that was a path I could have taken.
story_zako_battle_10_01/3702_0501_0200_1:
All the grownups ever taught me was to
take what I get and steal everything else...
story_zako_battle_10_01/3802_0101_0100_1:
I love your Pokémon...
Waaay more than you do...
story_zako_battle_10_01/3802_0101_0200_1:
I can spend more money and time on them than
you can...
story_zako_battle_10_01/3802_0101_0300_1:
Your Pokémon would be so much happier with me
than with you!
story_zako_battle_10_01/3802_0501_0100_1:
I would buy them everything they want!
I would give my everything to them!
story_zako_battle_10_01/3703_0101_0200_1:
I have arrived! Prepare to fight!
Right here! Right now!
story_zako_battle_10_01/3803_0101_0200_1: You were lookin’ at me, weren’t ya? Let’s battle!
story_zako_battle_10_01/3803_0501_0100_1:
Hey, thanks for havin’ that battle with me!
I appreciate you not runnin’!
story_zako_battle_10_01/3803_0501_0200_1:
I’ve got a bit of a mean lookin’ face, so most
people run away before battlin’ me.
